definition: variant of 辜負|辜负[gu1 fu4]
to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)

sentences.english: Do not betray my confidence. I await your response.
sentences.chinese: 请没有要孤负我的自信心，等待您的回答。

sentences.english: The United Nations Organization has not, so far, justified the hopes which the people of the world set on it.
sentences.chinese: 到纲后为行，结合国孤负了世界国民寄夺的盼望。

sentences.english: In failing to return the money he betrayed our trust.
sentences.chinese: 他未能偿还那笔钱而孤负了我们的信赖。

definition: (literary) to slip/(of looks etc) to fade away/(of time) to slip away/to squander (time, opportunities)/to dillydally
urgently/eagerly/worried/(urge sb to) be sure to/it is absolutely essential to (follow the above instruction)
to scoop up water with the hands
to be alone/to stand in isolation
to stay for a long period
precious/extremely valuable/(honorific) Please take good care of yourself!
to waste (one's breath, one's energy etc)/to try in vain
